item.title: Gamemode Ideas for ToL
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I never said that you claimed to make it, I said that noz doesn’t need to give credit because I’m pretty sure everyone who has played a game that can have multiple evil factions has thought it before. I have seen it on ToS forums, and they don’t even have two evil factions

EDIT: some games that already have it include one night ultimate games

item.title: Gamemode Ideas for ToL
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
“My ideas”
didn’t even bother to change “Fabulous Multiball” to anything else, just “Multiball” could have worked yet you take the only name for the mode that SOMEONE ELSE already said

“My ideas” my ass, I’m not gonna claim to have invented Multiball but give credit where it’s due, Jesus

item.title: Gamemode Ideas for ToL
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
Other people’s ideas

Return of the Blue Dragon- https://forum.imperium42.com/t/gamemode-idea-return-of-the-blue-dragon/4360 {Credit to Ashe}

Siege on The Zed- https://forum.imperium42.com/t/gamemode-idea-siege-on-the-xed-green-kraken-a-pirate-gamemode/11659 {Credit to Pug}

My ideas

F A B O U L O U S M U L T I B A L L- There are two scum factions and no neutrals.(The two scum teams are opposing each other)

Ranked-You know what this is. I trust the devs will put in a decent ranking system

This is all for now but I’ll update this soon.

Read full topic
